description:
I thought I would mix things up and get a big slab of 'mature' beef on the site!
Wagner works in the geeky tech industry but clearly spends a lot of time in the gym. He has done webcam shows over a year ago, but found it was hard to keep up with the pace. He stumbled onto a photographer friend of mine, who forwarded him to me.
He had a few days off around the Christmas holiday, things are usually quiet because air fare is outrageous, so I take some time to edit video, end of year backups, and overhauling the website.
But we got into contact and he popped on over to the studio for the solo. Very easy going, and with his previous cam work, he was very comfortable doing a solo.
He seems to be down for working with guys. He identifies as straight, but seems interested in working with dudes. At the very least getting head. For full sex, he said he would likely bottom, thinking that he might have problems staying hard. So I know he is at least considering more work.
As of the writing of this Summary, he has only done a solo, but with him semi-local, I have a feeling he will pop back on over and do a blow job video soon.
If you like manly men (I do wish he would just let his body hair go natural!) that are big and beefy, this man is for you!
title: Wagner - Solo
